title: Soft Metal Vampire
original_name: ソフトメタルヴァンパイア
sinopse:
The human's era has ended and the world has been invaded by powerful blood-sucking creatures...

Miika, a 16-year-old girl, after an encounter with the young dhampir Alan, has been dragged into the long-time war between the purebloods, dhampirs, and werewolves.

(Source: MU)
